letters_numbers: Tracing letter U with wet sponge and paper towel
activities: Count family members and match numbers

raw_excerpt: CHICAGO CONTEMPORARY PRESCHOOL Classroom: Pre-K Week of: September 8-12 Weekly Theme: We Are Family. Activities include crafts, sensory table with dollhouse items, letter U introduction, and family-themed books.
